name: @mobile/tinycolor2
description: Repackaged version of tinycolor2 for mobile
author: Brian Grinstead <briangrinstead@gmail.com> (http://briangrinstead.com)

scripts.commit: git add -A && git commit -m ":checkered_flag: v%npm_package_version% :heavy_minus_sign: Repackaging from: %npm_package_source_url%"
scripts.postupdate:download: npm run download && npm run update:copy
scripts.postupdate:commit: npm run commit && npm run tag
scripts.postupdate:push: npm run postupdate:download && npm run postupdate:commit && npm run push
